rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ARC2002, DGN1001, OHS1000}

description: This unit introduces the topic of person/product user interface. The mechanical and electro-mechanical systems that determine the relationship between a user's action and its outcome. The unit focuses upon products, environments, and systems, defining their form as it relates to how they are used. The unit covers how these products will be situated socially and culturally.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
